name: RAJA
description:
Prince from a distant planet, travel through a world filled with ruins and ancient vestiges to retrieve the lost crown!

A free short 2D platformer for PC

Admire stunning environment, solve puzzles & find many secrets!!

Controls :  <-/-> or Q/D + space bar OR controller

Game Art: Noah SAMBOU, Antonin ROBINOT, Agathe FASENTIEUX, Benoît CHENU, Keethana RAJENDRAN, Myriam VERMOTE, Marina CRUZ-BISSON & Lobo LIM

Music & Sound Design: Thilo GOLUZA & Vinh-An BUIS

Game Design & Programming: Sebastien GONET,  Julian CATHELINAIS & Marc PINSON

Soundcloud

Student project made in 3 months using Unity at ISART Digital Paris
